The following vcpkg-tool releases have occurred since the last registry release:
https://github.com/microsoft/vcpkg-tool/releases/tag/2024-07-10
In those tool releases, the following changes are particularly meaningful:
Add VxWorks as a platform expression by
@Neumann-A
in
microsoft/vcpkg-tool#1427
Fix x-update-baseline to use reference field by
@data-queue
in
microsoft/vcpkg-tool#1414
Check .csh and .pl for absolute paths by
@dg0yt
in
microsoft/vcpkg-tool#1426
Teach x-ci-verify-versions to check that versions exist in the database by
@BillyONeal
in
microsoft/vcpkg-tool#1210
Use curl for download on windows when proxy auth is required by
@sylvlecl
in
microsoft/vcpkg-tool#1434
Raise errors for malformed overlay port manifests  by
@dg0yt
in
microsoft/vcpkg-tool#1435
Downloads: Improve error message url is invalid by
@autoantwort
in
microsoft/vcpkg-tool#1411
Clarify asset caching output by
@JavierMatosD
in
microsoft/vcpkg-tool#1409
Add "-ForceEnglishOutput" flag to the NuGet help command in tools.cpp by
@kazssym
in
microsoft/vcpkg-tool#1451
Fix export command usage by
@myd7349
in
microsoft/vcpkg-tool#1450
